sent.orig: It is unwise to make friends with those whom one does not know well.
sent.trans: whom先行词是人，在定从中做宾语。

sent.orig: Whom is rarely used in everyday language.
sent.trans: 在日常使用的语言中很少用到whom这个词。

sent.orig: Distinguishing between those to whom we sell and those to whom we do not.
sent.trans: a区分那些我们销售的和我们不销售的对象。

sent.orig: Whom Allah doth guide, -he is on the right path: whom are the persons who perish.
sent.trans: 真主引导谁，谁是遵循正道的；真主使谁迷误，谁是亏折的。

sent.orig: Whom: With whom did you go?
